entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • csc.exe exits with code -2146232797 when attempting to concatenate strings that are part of an inline array #70910
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer #70909
  • Inconsistency between handling of `params` and default parameters during overload resolution #70908
  • F# missing syntactic classification highlighting #70905
  • Explicitly implemented members should not perform binding when computing their names #70901
  • CSharpUsePrimaryConstructorCodeFixProvider threw an exception #70898

Closed

  • Prefix unmerged changes from linked projects with "TODO" #290
    Backlog
  • Stack overflow with large nested collection expression #70381
    17.9
  • Unable to invoke quick fix for some suggestions #69636
    18.0
  • Visual Studio suggests new C# language features despite pinning the SDK to .NET 6.0 in `global.json` file #70902
  • IDE0028 analyzer and code fixer produce not compilable code #70904
  • `IDE0301` gets reported for `Array.Empty<T>()` inside Ternary Expression (and possibly other expressions?) #70903
  • Use Primary Constructor makes variables visible to the class that weren't before. #70899

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change inline rename control's color when format map change #70853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary hardcoded value in Generate-Type dialog #70906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Fix spelling mistakes #70907
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cut off deeply nested collection expressions #70882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify acceptability check helpers in OverloadResolution #70890
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pool intermediary collections when performing classification tagging/aggregation. #70884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
